dbmanagement

Class MemCacheClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbmanagement.MemCacheClient

  • @Configuration
public class MemCacheClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines various methods to configure memecache and add hashed key with it's value in memcache server

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MemCacheClient()
      Creates a static variable memcachedClient to configure set values for memcache server like defining servers and setting expiration time for key

        Inserts key value pair in memcache server
        Parameters:
